offerAndAcceptance.offer: Party A hereby extends an offer to engage in employment with Party B.
offerAndAcceptance.acceptance: Party B accepts this offer, and both parties mutually agree to the terms specified in this Contract.
offerAndAcceptance.meetingOfMinds: Both parties mutually agree to the terms specified in this Contract.

consideration.description: The consideration for this Contract shall consist of the wages and employment benefits provided to Party B.

contract.intentionToCreateLegalRelations: Both parties intend for this Contract to be legally binding.
contract.legalityOfPurpose: This Contract is formed in accordance with the labor laws of the People's Republic of China.

certaintyOfTerms.subjectMatter: The employment position and responsibilities of Party B.
certaintyOfTerms.price: Monthly wage and benefits as detailed in separate documentation.
certaintyOfTerms.timeForPerformance: The contract duration is defined in separate terms.

contract.consent: The parties agree and consent to the terms outlined in this Contract by their signatures below.

durationAndTermination.duration: The Contract is fixed-term from [MM/DD/YY] to [MM/DD/YY].
durationAndTermination.terminationConditions: Conditions for termination during the probationary period and other circumstances as stated in this Contract.
durationAndTermination.renewalTerms: The Contract may be renewed upon expiration through negotiation between the parties.

disputeResolution.details: Disputes shall be resolved by the labor arbitration committee where Party A is located.

governingLawAndJurisdiction.governingLaw: The laws of the People's Republic of China.
governingLawAndJurisdiction.jurisdiction: Jurisdiction of the court where Party A is located.

signatures.declaration: Party A affirms the terms of the Contract.
Party B affirms the terms of the Contract.
